name: Valmiki Foundation

address: Jade Arcade, Opp: Hotel Paradise, M.G.Road

briefDescription: Valmiki Hriday is a pet project of Valmiki Foundation. Its home for Orphans,Semi Orphans and destitute children with first class amenities, High quality education is been provided to all the inmates.  Valmiki Foundation started by Surya Ganesh Valmiki an Entrepreneur 8 years ago and being run and supported by his brothers Valmiki Hari Kishan and Raj Valmiki.  Valmiki Foundation does lots of awareness programs especially on Child Education and Health.  Long term aim as to Construct VALMIKI GURUKUL for as many destitute children as possible.
